title: What God Has Promised
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c

v1: God has not promised skies always blue,
Flower strewn pathways all our lives thru;
God has not promised sun without rain,
Joy without sorrow, peace without pain.
v2: God has not promised we shall not know
Toil and temptation, trouble and woe;
He has not told us we shall not bear
Many a burden, many a care.
v3: God has not promised smooth roads and wide,
Swift, easy travel, needing no guide;
Never a mountain, rocky and steep,
Never a river, turbid and deep.
c1: But God has promised strength for the day,
Rest for the labor, light for the way,
Grace for the trials, help from above,
